settings.content:
Real Homes, Real Stories

  • Touch and Feel Real
  • Gain Insights from Real Customer Experiences
  • Visualize Your Future Outdoor Space
Discover Innovation at the AlunoTec Showroom

settings.name: Roberto Janeiro
settings.content: AlunoTec's team is very efficient, they took their time to explain and compare their different products with me, they supported me all through the transaction and always gave me updates! The pergola came very well packed, each pieces were packed and protected individually. Their products are very high quality, not to be mistaken with store bought pergolas. Very happy with this purchase!

settings.name: Willem Mouissie
settings.content: AlunoTec is a very trustworthy company. Over the years I experience a pleasant cooperative attitude. Their products are from an exceptional quality. Transportation from start to end went smooth. My contact agent Connie Wong is a Wonderfull guide through all processes . I certainly recommend this company. Willem Mouissie/Caribbean

settings.name: Nash
settings.content: I have yet to install the pergola, but I have received it and all parts seem to be of good quality.  Just as importantly, the Sales Manager, Fannie Fu, has been nothing short of amazing.  She's been excellent with her quick responses, especially when considering the time difference. She has assisted with questions every step of the way and really made what was a large and uncertain purchase, much more palatable.  I'm trying to get this installed sooner than later and will try to update when it's all done, but for now, if you have any inquiries, reach out to Fannie and she will not let you down.

settings.name: Michael Dunphy
settings.content: From the start my experience with Alunotec professional and efficient. I dealt with one person from the beginning and Scott was very knowledgeable & helpful from design to construction of my Pergola to the delivery from China to Ireland, door to door. Alunotec also were very helpful putting my pergola together on site at my Home. I would have no problem recommending Alunotec for any Pergola needs.

settings.name: Lara
settings.content: The customer service here is the BEST!  I have never been treated so nicely and even when there was a problem with the product, they followed up with me for months afterward and they made sure everything was fixed.  I would HIGHLY recommend this company!

settings.name: James T Nash
settings.content: AlunoTec is a wonderful company to do business with. I have done several projects with them and the customer service from start to finish and delivery is extremely professional My representative Hazel worked through every detail with design - pricing- selections - fabrication - delivery and install

settings.heading: The Trust We Build
settings.box_text: "We just built a 14x20 ft pergola in our back backyard for outdoor kitchen and I am very pleased with the installation!!"
